Subject: Contract offer
FYI- Longport has offered me a better contract!
They offer a little more money.

Regards,
Tony Acuña

Regards,
Lawrence Chambers

Tony Acuña

Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1984
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Dennis Sampson



Date: Thursday, 4/3/1984
Subject: Victor Amato learns new position
Victor Amato has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
